coreAttributes.name: Plasma Pistol
coreAttributes.description: A plasma pistol that shoots super-heated gas, one of the most versatile weapon that can be give to either space marines, imperial guards, inquisitors, ect...
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc2.name] with your plasma pistol.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the plasma pistol. For the Emperor!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] a sphere of plasma at [npc2.name]. [npc2.name] was engulfed in a blue fiery explosion.
Opening fire, [npc2.name] [npc.verb(watch)] as the plasma shot grows nearer in a matter of instants! And soon, all [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] is death.
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the plasma shot collides with [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] a sphere of plasma at [npc2.name]. [npc2.name] dodged the sphere of death.
Opening fire, [npc2.name] [npc.verb(watch)] as the plasma shot grows nearer in a matter of instants! And soon, all [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] is... nothing. [npc.name] missed.
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the plasma shot collides with [npc2.name]! Or so [npc.name] thought, but the plasma shot missed its target.
